name: DSPSplitComplex
desc: A structure that represents a single-precision complex vector with the real and imaginary parts stored in separate arrays.

items.name: init(realp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>, imagp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>)
items.desc: Creates a new split complex structure.

items.name: var imagp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>
items.desc: An array of imaginary parts of the complex numbers.

items.name: var realp: UnsafeMutablePointer<Float>
items.desc: An array of real parts of the complex numbers.
